Stack.TituloTres: Tools and Other Technologies I Work With

Experience.SubTituloUno: Here you'll find some of the projects I've worked on, both personal and for clients

Puntomind.Descripcion: Web app for a management consultancy
Puntomind.Contenido: SaaS (Software as a Service) designed to improve business management and commercial strategy with professional reports, matrices, methods, metrics, graphs, and analytics.

Contenido.ContenidoUno: Numa is a web application designed to help people manage their personal finances in a simple and intuitive way.
Contenido.ContenidoDos: Most financial tools tend to be complex or not user-friendly, so my goal was to create a clean, accessible, and user-centered experience.
Contenido.ContenidoTres: From a technical perspective, I implemented dynamic routes, user authentication and authorization, data handling, responsive design, and cloud deployment.

Contenido.ContenidoUno: This project was born from my interest in the world of coffee and my desire to create a modern, visually appealing, and functional website to showcase my web development skills.
Contenido.ContenidoDos: I also wanted to experiment with a real project structure: routes, local data, and cloud deployment.

About.ContenidoUno: I'm a passionate developer who loves building solutions that make a real impact. Curiosity, perseverance, and a genuine commitment to growth — both personal and within the team — are what drive me.
About.ContenidoDos: I truly believe the best results come from collaboration. That's why I enjoy sharing knowledge, learning from others, and putting my energy into achieving great things together.

HabilidadUno.Descripcion: I listen, share, and build solutions together with others

HabilidadDos.Descripcion: I don't stop until I achieve clear results

HabilidadTres.Descripcion: I take initiative and constantly look for ways to improve processes

HabilidadCuatro.Descripcion: Every project is an opportunity to grow

HabilidadCinco.Descripcion: I care about the team's well-being as much as the final outcome
